title: Number of U.S. households with broadband internet access 2000 to 2018
yAxis: Number of U.S. households with broadband internet access (in millions)
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of U.S. households with broadband internet access (in millions), containing a total of 19 data points.
In general Number of U.S. households with broadband internet access (in millions) has rose over the Year.
Number of U.S. households with broadband internet access (in millions) is slightly increasing from 2000 to 2006, and finally roughly constant from 2006 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2004 and 2005.
The highest Number of U.S. households with broadband internet access (in millions), of value 110.57 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest Number of U.S. households with broadband internet access (in millions), of value 7.07 was reported at Year 2000
